Comparing the US States

— Data Analysis —  
July 12, 2019
Data Analysis JavaScript

I have created a new web page to compare the US states to help you decide where to live. The site uses light/dark gradients (choropleth) to graph data directly on a map of the states. The idea for this site came from a conversation with a friend.
